trans-unit.source: Description: Provide help or troubleshooting tips to your users, and teach them to effectively interact with your app.
trans-unit.target: Description: Provide help or troubleshooting tips to your users, and teach them to effectively interact with your app.

trans-unit.source: This section provides best practices for instructing users along the way as they use your app.
trans-unit.target: This section provides best practices for instructing users along the way as they use your app.

trans-unit.source: title: UX guidelines for help and instructions
trans-unit.target: title: UX guidelines for help and instructions

trans-unit.source: label: In-app help and instructional UI
trans-unit.target: label: In-app help and instructional UI

trans-unit.source: Provide help or troubleshooting tips to your users, and teach them to effectively interact with your app.

trans-unit.source: This section provides best practices for instructing users along the way as they use your app.

trans-unit.source: These guidelines describe how to design effective Help content for your app.
trans-unit.target: These guidelines describe how to design effective Help content for your app.

trans-unit.source: Design an instructional user interface (UI) that teaches users how to work with your Windows Store app.
trans-unit.target: Design an instructional user interface (UI) that teaches users how to work with your Windows Store app.
